tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Suresh Gowda is always there for my twins. He responds to all my queries and emergencies when required. Friendly doctor and great experience. Would definitely recommend him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr Suresh Gowda is one of the finest pediatrician we have come accross. He is very patient with all our queries and never hesitate to explain things in details. 

He even responds to query over whatsApp and that makes him our go to Doctor for all our children's need.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I visited for Paediatric care
It is always important to choose the right pediatrician when you enter parenthood and we were so glad that we chose Dr. Suresh Gowda for our lil one. When our new born was infected with cold n cough we visited a nearby pediatrician couple of times for our babys treatment but unfortunately there was no recovery but our consultation with Dr. Suresh Gowda was a success. The Doctor is not only kind and patient to listen to our concerns but also provides the best solution in a single visit without needing to consult again. Dr Suresh Gowdas patience* ********** experience and caring expertise is highly appreciated. I would dearly thank and recommend Dr. Suresh Gowda for every child related health issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Highly recommended..Very friendly and makes you feel welcome and at ease. Took my newborn daughter for neonatal jaundice and I must say was very satisfied with the way he listened to us and treated my kid. Even after we left banglore we used to WhatsApp him for small doubts from our hometown in Darjeeling, and he always used to respond within a couple of hours and sometimes within minutes.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I gave birth in motherhood hospital and from day one my son has been under the pediatric care of Dr.Suresh Gowda. Doctor is very patient, friendly and calm. He listens to all our queries and answers them precisely. He answers all our offline queries (even very silly ones) via phone call or whatsapp anytime. So you feel very comfortable.

My son had jaundice from day 7 and doctor made sure that all the required tests and treatment were done at the right time. He always called me directly over phone and informed the test results after every test and about what the next action plan needs to be. This happens very rarely elsewhere. Under his care my baby is completely fine now.

I was waiting to write my review after my son's first vaccination so here I am. My baby cried only during the time of injection which was about 2 to 5minutes and after that he was completely fine. I had earlier read a similar review about vaccination and have now experienced the same. Hence I would recommend him for all vaccinations as well.
 
I would like to thank Dr.Suresh Gowda for all the pediatric care that my baby received so far and would be receiving in future.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr.Suresh Gowda sir is most humble and patience doctor. He will listen to each and every problem of kids. As a new parent we will be worried of smallest problem of babies, doctor will patiently listen and tell the solution. He will never ever loose his calmness and also always he will be available on watsapp, and replies if we have any issues. We are lucky to have such a wonderful doctor for our babies.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Since day one we are consulting Dr.Suresh. During every visit I came up with 100s of questions he never hesitated to answer them. He is very practical when it comes to handling the child. His suggestions will not deviate much from what our parents were following during our childhood.
On top of those , he respond to messages even during night times.
Thanks a lot for everything doctor. Your positive approach gives us confidence that we were growing our child in right way.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My son was unwell due to horrible flu. In a weeks time his flu symptoms kept changing. It’s was really scary. Each time I went to the doctor he kept his calm, explained the problem and suggested the correct medication. At a point I even asked him if blood test was required. Doctor explained me with so much patience that it was just a flu and no blood test was required. Doctors are god is what people say and Doctor Suresh Gowda is a perfect example for that saying. Doctor you are wonderful. Thank you.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Our son was born in Motherhood HRBR on 27th Oct 2017. Immediately after the birth Dr. Suresh Gowda took good care of our child as our child had to be kept in NICU for few days due to low oxygen saturation, reflux .  We were updated daily on the status and he treated the kid promptly with right medicine.

Recently we had to move to Chennai for 3 months . During that days Dr. Suresh promptly responded to all our questions on phone call and what’s app .  This a great help to us . We recommend him highly

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I gave birth to my son in Motherhood HRBR and have been associated with Dr.Suresh since then,he has been very helpful, I usually visit him for vaccinations and monthly appointments.

It is important to say, he takes away parents stress and relieves us of our anxiety in a most efficient way. He responds to Whatsapp messages, I usually message him  only incase of emergency. 

As far as the diagnosis and treatment, he is on the spot!! He clearly knows what the issue is and prescribes medicines accordingly, he doesn't talk unnecessarily. 

He scores 100% as far as his professional knowledge, attitude and response. 

Thank you !

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Suresh Gowda was in charge of receiving our daughter at delivery, born one month pre-term. He imparted a sense of calm and assurance that our daughter would be fine (and she is!).

Under his care, she spent 2 days in NICU to be stabilized before she was handed over to us. He also ensured that my husband had an opportunity to meet our baby in the delivery area before she was moved to NICU.

We have been consulting him ever since, for our daughter's ailments and vaccinations. Every visit has been marked with his courtesy & competence. He is also responsive to follow up questions over WhatsApp.

Based on our experience Dr. Suresh Gowda continues to be our doctor of choice for our baby girl.

PS: Our daughter appears to be nodding her head over this review ;)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We have been consulting Dr. Suresh since the birth of our baby, and it has been two years now. We are fully satisfied with his recommendations and treatment. He patiently  listens to all our concerns and  explains every detail about pediatric behavior, growth patterns and baby's needs. During lockdown days due to Corona virus, our kid stopped eating solid food for nearly a week. We reached him over whatapp and explained him our concerns which were addressed to our satisfaction. Thank you Dr. Suresh Gowda.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Suresh Gowda has been the doctor of my child since his birth. He has been an amazing pediatrician!  **** **** ************* *** helpful and takes his time to diagnose and explain what illness or ailment is bothering the child. He listens so patiently and suggests everything that is best for the baby. He is not a medication pusher and does not prescribe  unnecessary medications. My baby had jaundice for almost 5 months after birth. Dr. Suresh Gowda kept us calm and patient. My baby is almost a year now and I have been taking my baby to Dr. Suresh Gowda for all his vaccinations as well. Even when I am not in town and my kid falls sick, Dr Suresh Gowda is always available over whatsapp or a normal call. I cannot thank Motherhood Hospital enough for introducing us to Dr Suresh Gowda as he is always there for my kid when needed. I highly recommend Dr. Suresh Gowda to all the parents worried about their babies.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We choose motherhood hospital for delivery of our first baby, from the day 0 of our baby we're consulting Dr Suresh Gowda, after few days our baby had a little complications coz of infections which was due to pre-term, From them till now this doctor is being the best he had counseled/consoled many times (though he didn't have to do it as a doctor to us) but the treatment the way he considers the babies as his own and the way he talks to parents he's simply out of the world. **** *** **** *** **** ** ********* **** ************ with a great track records and the humbleness or politeness which he has as an human being, simply said that's no words which would describe him as a doctor and a person.
Strongly recommend anyone whose looking for a pediatric and Neonatologists

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My baby is 8 months old now and has been under care of Dr Gowda from the beginning. He carries with himself a very rich experience which is pretty evident in his approach towards paediatric care of my baby. He hears you out with Patience and answers all the queries.. never in rush to send you out and attend to another patient..  but the best part is when he gives injections for vaccination to my baby, my son never gets swelling or too much pain.. the baby only cries for  a minute or so and then he is calm..

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review:
My daughter was under the paediatric care of Dr. Suresh from birth and I'm glad that I have a doctor for my daughter who is genuine, calm and gives the right advice at the right time.
As a new parent, we are very concerned about our daughter in every little thing which is new to us, changed doctors but weren't very satisfied with the way they consult.
I respect the way this doctor treats, listens patiently to the issues and most important guides a parent with information (In a society filled with illogical myths taken very seriously) that clarifies the facts as per medical science and actually convinces the mind (atleast mine). Getting confirmation from a professional of the right treatment for my baby comforts me alot. I would like to highlight the fact that the doctor responds on phone when needed, such professionals who are open to help people this way making time out of their busy schedule truly are a blessing and need to be appreciated. This act of kindness indeed is something that is to be respected. 
Lastly, I would like to add that the hospital Motherhood has doctors who have the courtesy to honour their patients professionally. Even though the consultation fee is high, it can be afforded considering the treatment, good health and hygienic environment which is most important in anybody's life.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Gowda is a very experienced Pediatrician and we are seeing him for both our kids. He was instrumental in critical care treatment for my daughter and it was life saver.

Dr Suresh explained in detail what they will do Once the baby is admitted to NICU.even though I went for 2 nd opinion He even gave his number to contact him in case I needed more information.

review: Doctor is very friendly and explains all in detail. He answers all our questions very patiently. He shows empathy towards parents and good care for newborns and older kids too. We showed for both our kids and his advices are very helpful. Doctor is mostly punctual and hence no long waiting hours.He answers parents doubt on watsapp which is really the need of the hour. This anytime approchability is a boon to working parents .. overall a very supportive doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr Suresh is a very caring doctor. He is very thorough and does not leave anything to chance.

Mother's especially new mother's tend to be very worried about each and every little thing regarding their little one and Dr Suresh makes sure that he puts those fears to rest.

I had called him many times during his vacation (due to an emergency) and he always took enough time to make sure everything was alright. It's the little things that matter and Dr Suresh is all about that.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr Suresh Gowda is a very good pediatric doctor and what we liked best was his calm nature in explaining the any details to us. He does not prescribe unncessary medicines for the little ones and patiently listens to parents query and explain the details to us. 

His experience and with this good attitude is what makes him a very good doctor. We had good experience with this doctor and hence would refer Dr Suresh Gowda to others.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Suresh is excellent & an experienced doctor. He is very approachable, understands the issue properly & with patience. He explains the problem in detail & also on the medication. I would strongly recommend Dr Suresh Gowda for your kid as he gets to know the root cause & then gets into prescribing medication.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: The support and guidance we received from Dr Suresh Gowda is immense. The Doctor ensured the relevant course of treatment to our baby as a new born requiring NICU care and through subsequent followups. He also took time to explain the reasons and the course of treatment. My baby is now 2 months old and he is doing extremely well, thanks to the treatment, care and support  from Dr Suresh Gowda. We would strongly recommend visiting him if you need to visit a paedetrician.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Newborn Jaundice,Childhood Infections,Paediatric care,Neonates,All Pediatric Problems ,
review: I would recommend Dr.Suresh to every mother like me who gets worried for every small little thing related to her child. He has thorough knowledge of different symptoms that children show up at eveMy son had jaundice as soon as he was born but under his guidance he was able to recover very effectively. Apart from that every thing right from a fever to cough and cold, also all vaccinations us done with so much perfection that I don't mind travelling 200 kms to just get my son checked by the doctor. His availability is commendable, and keeps his patients on priority always.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Suresh Gowda has been my daughter's paediatrician since the time she was born. I would like to recommend him as he is one of those few doctors who would guide you perfectly with your child's health conditions. He is someone who would prescribe medicines to the child after having a detailed conversation with the parents and then checking the child. He never prescribes any supplements unless there's the actual need. I've come across people worrying about the child's weight and doctors prescribing supplements for weight gain. Dr. Suresh Gowda always ensures you that the weight gain is just a number and as long as the child is active and achieving the milestones it's okay to be underweight and there's nothing to worry about it. He ensures that the child and parents are at ease before starting the discussion about the child's health.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

Happy withDoctor friendliness & Explanation of the  issue

Dr.Suresh Gowda listens patiently our conecrns and clarified .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: We consulted Doctors in Indranagar motherhood previously and moving into new place.. It was quite difficult to find a good paediatric doctor.. Well, when we got in, the welcome was amicable and to our surprise the kid didn't act fussy when he began to look at him.. Which he did previously on all Docs visit.. The ailment was a known one but the reasons is what we wanted to hear and it was explained correctly.. Sure we would pay him a visit again on friendly basis but not to treat the kid again, coz the kid is all fine.. Cent percent to the Docs medication.. Cheers - Stephen

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: Being a parent it is tough to see our little one struggling with illnesses. At that point one would prefer to have an experienced consultants around to seek genuine advices. I had consulted several doctors within Bangalore for  my 3 yr old son with recurrent fever. * ***** ** **** *** **** ********* ********* **** ** ****** ***** ** ********** **** ***** He is well-versed in his field, a patient listener , analyze each case to its core, gives time and attention to minute details, prescribes necessary medications.(No antibiotics prescribed unless required).  My son is showing tremendous improvement under his guidance. I am really glad to consult Dr Suresh. His expertise and dedication towards his profession is highly appreciable and I recommend Dr Suresh and Motherhood to all the parents around.
